column4: Ekiga is always saying "Registration failed: Forbidden" when I login!
Can someone help me please?  I would like to use my Gizmo account!
what's not working.. You can't log in?
hang on let me check my gizmo config.
Did you already register on their site?  If so your user name and password are case sensitive.
No, simply increasing the volume of an already-written file.

if the volume controls in Audacity are already turned up all the way you will want to look at the master volume. You could also right click the master volume of the system and choose "Open Volume cont." Play with the slides there.
if I increase the Gain, will it do anything?
or were you really asking how to increase the imbedded volume level of the file.?
glad your back... choose "edit" + "select all" then "Effect" + "Amplify".  That will allow you to increase the db of the track
it should increase the db gain of the track.  Beyond that I'm stumped.. works for me.
